titleStmt.title: Medicinal experiments, or, A collection of choice and safe remedies for the most part simple and easily prepared, useful in families, and very serviceable to country people / by R. Boyle ; to which is annexed a catalogue of his theological and philosophical books and tracts.
titleStmt.author: Boyle, Robert, 1627-1691.

notesStmt.note: Vol. I has two parts, each with special t.p., and the Catalogue of theological and philosophical books and tracts, which has special t.p. and separate pagination.
Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
